Module Frogger
Package p4_group_8_repo.Views

Class EndScreenView

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.Views.EndScreenView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameViews
public class EndScreenView
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameViews
This class is responsible for displaying the end screen at the end of the game which consists of the list of high scores in the game and a button to go back to the main menu.

    • createVBox

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox createVBox​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Creates the VBox that will contain the tableview and the buttons of the end screen.
      Parameters:
      stage - current stage of the application
      Returns:
      a VBox containing the buttons and tableview

    • getScoresDataTableView

      private javafx.scene.control.TableView<ScoresData> getScoresDataTableView()
      Generates the TableView that will display the high scores of the players for the different levels.
      Updated as the users play the game and arranges the scores in descending order (from highest to lowest).
      Returns:
      TableView of type ScoresData (Scores of the users of the game)

    • getFileSource

      private java.lang.String getFileSource()
      Gets the file source's path depending on the level of the game.
      Returns:
      file source's path
